attributes.action: Cancel IR35 until CoronaVirus is beaten.
attributes.additional_details: Some companies, are already experiencing a loss of work because of the CoronaVirus outbreak, by April things could be much worse, and a lot of smaller companies will need their cash flow, larger companies will have an added workload to decide if workers should be put on payroll or not, using up resources and staff that may be off sick, when they could be helping to concentrate on logistics or health matters
attributes.background:
Postpone IR35 until the Coronavirus Outbreak is beaten, Self Employed people are already noticing jobs being cancelled and less work in their industry’s which could get much worse.
This will give smaller companies and larger companies more time and funds to concentrate the current outbreak.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Delay implementation of IR35 legislation reform until COVID-19 is resolved
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552730
